Way cool, Tiffany!  Wonder if there's a way to get it to create links 
for the location ID so all one would have to do is click on it and 
PRESTO (assuming ff.net isn't down at the time).  Probably not 
just 'cause that would be too efficient.  :-)  I assume you were 
hoping it would create links when you created the table?  (Looks like 
it since you have the full URL for them.)

Just out of curiosity, what criteria did you use for including a 
story in the database?  There must be hundreds (over a thousand?) 
that involve Saitou.  Is it only when the story involves the 
revolutionary time period or other members of the Shinsengumi?  
(uh... I think what I'm trying to get at is "Saitou other than just a 
Meiji cop"?)

You should post a message over on SHQSD for newcomers to bump into if 
they read past messages so they'll know it's there.  I think so far 
most people on SHQSD are on this list, too (which I'm really glad 
of), but there are always exceptions.

Thanks for starting it up!
phil

-- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Tiffany" <makoto@s...> wrote:
> I started a database at 
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ_Spy_Division/
> everyone can add records
